item.title: About me
item.description: My background Hi! My name is Michaela and I am a recent Bioengineering graduate from Imperial College London. I am interested in Software engineering, data analysis and healthcare. In my free time I love to cook and bake - I even internshiped in one of my all time favourite bakeries in London (C&D). I also like to take a break from my screen and be creative - I am currently learning to paint, I enjoy reading
